Australia's largest Online Marketing specialist providing Search Engine Optimisation, Web Design & Web Development Solutions.

head.title: Web Design, Online Marketing, Website Developer

td.h1: Web Design, Online Marketing, Website Developer, EU UK USA ASIA AU

tr.td: Search Engine Optimisation strategy drives traffic to your website using our WebMagnet technology.
Business Web Solutions tailored to you. Explore your options.
At Exa, we believe eCommerce is a crucial element of Online Marketing. Deliver true value by turning your website into a profitable business tool.
Contact us to discuss your unique requirements with a consultant obligation free.

td.h2: You've arrived at the world of Exa
td.p: With over 120 full time Staff we are Australia's largest Web Marketing and Solutions Company. We partner hundreds of medium to large, local, national and international organisations with Strategic Web Marketing & Web Solutions to enhance their business, marketing and profit goals.

Now in our seventh year of operation, Exa's brilliant programming teams have built up literally millions of lines of extraordinary programming code that we fully customise for any given client solution. We are now able to profitably deliver you solutions for $10K that we could not possibly have deployed for anything under $50K just 2 years ago. Whatever you do - don't just go with the "cheap" solution, it is a totally false economy.

Only Exa has the Patented Web Magnet TechnologyPatent Number 2005100416 valid until 18/05/2013 that propels our clients to the top of Google and the other search engines. No other company has the results we do, click here for a small sample of them. Don't settle for second best. Over the years, Exa has also built up a huge stable of world class web solutions including Content Management Systems, Corporate Intranet Design & DevelopmentDeveloping solutions where all corporate knowledge is available on-line, is fully searchable, and can be updated by anyone in the organisation without the need for 3rd party tools, and requiring no technical knowledge., Extranets, eCommerce, Mass Emailing and hundreds of other customised solutions. Solutions that save big money and help drive efficiency throughout an organisation or supply chain. See our Folio for details.

td.h2: Our world circles around passion and strategy
td.p: Web DesignThe art and method of creating an effective online presence to best represent the image and identity of your business, particularly the design of a website's look, feel and graphical style., Web MarketingA structured and measurable business promotional campaign that incorporates all the factors involved in producing an effective online presence., Search Engine OptimisationCommonly known as SEO, Search Engine Optimisation is the science or method of making your web site search engine friendly so as to achieve rankings and top positions in internet searches and thereby increasing the opportunities for your website to be found by customers., eCommerceA sales model where products and services are sold or promoted directly to end users via the internet. The focus for an eCommerce business will be a website incorporating product information and the ability to purchase or make orders online., e-Mail MarketingThe method of utilising electronic mail (email) as a medium for Marketing and Promotions., Content Management Systems, Copy WritingA vital ingredient to your effective Online Marketing campaign, Copy Writing is the professional preparation of the written content that represents the information regarding your business and communicates to your target audience and customers., Web DevelopmentThe actual production of programming code (HTML, PHP, ASP, etc.) that generates a website's form and function., Revamps, Web ApplicationA reasonably self-contained module of code that performs a specific function on a website, such as sending broadcast emails, and which can be easily re-used on other websites., Database Driven SitesWhere a database of information is used to control the content and functionality of the site., Software DevelopmentSoftware Development is the process of creating and constructing computer programs and other software services, including websites. and IT Services.

13 million Australians are now online (with over 60% on broadband) searching for products and services to buy and six million searches are done per day on Google Australia alone. At Exa we understand that your website's position in search engines is a vital client source and lead generator for your business. It's this understanding and our industry know-how that gives us the edge in Internet Marketing and puts our clients ahead of their competitors.

Our Company Directors, Management and Staff have a combined five hundred years of experience in the IT Service and Web Development industries. Compare that with your current providers. This experience is a key reason Exa is the industry's best in Web Design and Search Engine Optimisation. We share a goal with our clients to generate the maximum return on investment from their web model in the shortest possible time.
